pageContext.title: Carrier Wave
pageContext.content: Porcupine’s 2015, “Carrier Wave” release remastered and reissued on vinyl with 2 unearthed bonus tracks! Recorded by Steve Albini (Big Black/Shellac) at Electrical Audio + now Remastered by Greg Reierson. This exceptional batch of indie pop/rock gems finally see a vinyl release! Features Husker Du bassist Greg Norton with MN music vets Casey Virock (guitar) and Ian Prince (drums). The band just wrapped a run of dates opening for MC5 on their MC-50th anniversary tour. Limited to 200 classic black LP’s. Comes w/ download code.
